WorkItem.Description:
probably a minor issue as these scenarios are going to disappear soon (hopefully), but if you have a database with compatiblity level 6.5 on a SQL Server 2000 instance, the following error is risen:

WARNING: [servername] Error gathering Database information: Exception calling "ExecuteWithResults" with "1"
argument(s): "Execute with results failed for Database 'databasename'. " (SqlServerDatabaseEngineInformation.psm1 line 8391
char 42)

Seems no other database information is recorded after the error ad the Excel reports don't have them.
WorkItem.Summary: Problem with databases having 6.5 compatibility level

Comments.Message: I'll have to try and reproduce this one. This might be an artifact of using SMO against SQL 2000 and an older compatibility level.
